bottles.name: Ivan's Vodka
bottles.description:
Very strong vodka.
Smells like cigarettes.

bottles.name: Aeki Vodka
bottles.description:
Light Vodka.
Tastes like meatballs.

bottles.name: Romantic Vodka
bottles.description:
Medium vodka.
Feels like it's given up.

bottles.name: Not Your Neighbor's Vodka
bottles.description:
Robust Vodka.
Afraid of it's neighbors.

bottles.name: Freedom Vodka
bottles.description:
Light Vodka.
Don't let it see oil.

bottles.name: London Dry Gin
bottles.description:
Carefully distilled dry gin.
Or was it arbitrarily?

bottles.name: Plymouth Gin
bottles.description:
Gin that claims to taste better when made in a certain area.
Is there really a difference?

bottles.name: Windmill Gin
bottles.description:
Flavorful Gin.
Seems more like a scotch than a gin.

bottles.name: International Gin
bottles.description:
Sweet Gin.
Looks kinda cheap.

bottles.name: Scotch
bottles.description:
Strong Scotch.
What is this weird symbol?

bottles.name: Whiskey in the Rye
bottles.description:
Made mostly from rye.
This bottle feels kinda phony.

bottles.name: Malt Whiskey
bottles.description:
Malted Whiskey.
Doesn't smell like a milkshake to me.

bottles.name: Leprechaun's Whiskey
bottles.description:
Green looking whiskey.
Leprechauns give me nightmares.

bottles.name: Blended Whiskey
bottles.description:
Many whiskeys mixed together.
Reminds me of how ${master} smelled late at night.

bottles.name: Bourbon
bottles.description:
Made mostly from corn.
A shot of this has less calories than a banana.

bottles.name: Marker Whisky
bottles.description:
Whiskey, but without the e.
Is there even a difference?

bottles.name: Marker Whiskey
bottles.description: Regular whiskey. There's some rocks stuck to it.

bottles.name: White Rum
bottles.description:
Light and white rum.
Take that Rousseau!

bottles.name: Medium Rum
bottles.description:
Medium rum.
Doesn't let you see into the future.

bottles.name: Full Rum
bottles.description: alcoholic

bottles.name: Spiced Rum
bottles.description:
Spiced rum.
The bottle says "You have to drink it's friends before you drink this."

bottles.description: alcoholic

bottles.name: Blanco Tequila
bottles.description: alcoholic

bottles.name: Gold Tequila
bottles.description: alcoholic
